_comment_linux_stdin: On Linux, Bun may crash with EINVAL on inherited pipe fds from Claude Code (#646). The worker-service handles this via stdin-reader.ts isStdinAvailable() guard. If issues recur on Linux, bun-runner.js still exists as a Node.js stdin-buffering fallback.
